name: nanbi12i
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w2, w3)), wb(w0, w2), wb(w1, w3))

body.origin:
|- wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w2, w3))
-| wb(w0, w2)
-| wb(w1, w3)
-| wi(wa(wb(w0, w2), wb(w1, w3)), wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w2, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w2, w3))
-| wb(w0, w2)
-| wb(w1, w3)
-| wi(wa(wb(w0, w2), wb(w1, w3)), wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w2, w3)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wb(w0, w2), wb(w1, w3)), wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w2, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w2, w3))
-| wb(w0, w2)
-| wb(w1, w3)

comment: Join two logical equivalences with anti-conjunction. (Contributed by SF, 2-Jan-2018.)
